translation.en: [female radio host] It's 75 degrees in sunny San Diego,
translation.fr: Il fait 24 degrés à San Diego

translation.en: and the number one song of the day is still "Blush" by Koop.
translation.fr:
et le tube du jour
est toujours "Blush" de Koop.

translation.en: ♪ I feel your eyes on me ♪
translation.fr: Je sens ton regard sur moi

translation.en: ♪ You should know better… ♪
Whoo!
♪ You put on the pressure ♪
♪ Something tells me I, I should not let go… ♪
translation.fr:
Quelque chose me dit
Que je devrais pas lâcher l'affaire

translation.en: Whoo! It's my birthday! It's my birthday!
translation.fr: Quelque chose fait que je doute… C'est mon anniv' !

translation.en: ♪ I've been working hard… ♪
translation.fr: J'ai tout fait pour que tu voies

translation.en: Whoo! Here we go! Here we go! Here we go!
translation.fr: J'ai tout fait pour que tu voies L'effet que tu me fais…

translation.en: It's an impromptu dance party with my best friend since first grade!
translation.fr:
Choré improvisée
avec ma meilleure amie d'enfance !

translation.en: -Because it's your birthday! -[both screaming]
Go, go. Work, work. Drop it low. Oh.
I love this song, but I'm very hungry.
translation.fr: J'adore, mais je meurs de faim.

translation.en: Okay, I need your help.
Question. What do you think? Quarter-life chic? Or quarter-life crisis?
translation.fr: Donne-moi ton avis. 25 ans chic ? Ou 25 ans en crise ?

translation.en: Huh. Well, right now, you're matching the lamp, so…
translation.fr: Tu es assortie à la lampe, donc…

translation.en: -Would a hat help? -[chuckles] No.
Rude!
-Here. -Thank you.
Okay, for my Cassie-palooza kickoff night, we are gonna start off at the club
translation.fr: Pour lancer la Palooza de Cassie, on va commencer en boîte,

translation.en: where I've spent all afternoon decorating the VIP area.
translation.fr:
où on va décorer la zone VIP
tout l'après-midi.

translation.en: -Hey, I have this crazy idea. -[mouth full] I'm listening.
translation.fr:
J'ai une idée folle. - Dis-moi.
- Au lieu de sortir…

translation.en: Instead of going out for your birthday, what if we just stay home,
translation.fr:
- Dis-moi.
- Au lieu de sortir… On pourrait rester ici.

translation.en: and we put on our stretchy pants, and we puzzle like we used to,
translation.fr:
On se met en jogging, on fait un puzzle comme avant
et on recommande des nouilles.

translation.en: and we order more noodles?
translation.fr:
on fait un puzzle comme avant
et on recommande des nouilles.

translation.en: No, no. We're not staying in. It's my birthday week.
translation.fr:
Non, on sort. Je vais avoir 25 ans.
Je dois marquer le coup !

translation.en: I have to ring in 25 with style!
translation.fr:
Je vais avoir 25 ans.
Je dois marquer le coup !

translation.en: You've rung in the past four years with style. One night in won't kill you.
translation.fr:
Comme depuis quatre ans !
Tu peux survivre à une soirée calme.

translation.en: Besides, we haven't puzzled in weeks. I mean, look at Mona.
translation.fr: En plus, on a délaissé le puzzle. Regarde Mona sans son sourire.

translation.en: She is missing her smile, and it's kind of depressing.
translation.fr: Regarde Mona sans son sourire. C'est déprimant.

translation.en: I'm not bailing on my kickoff party. It is tradition. My friends expect this.
translation.fr:
Non, j'y vais.
C'est la tradition et mes amis seront là.

translation.en: Well, your best friend has a huge week ahead of her.
I was just added as one of the junior research assistants on a team studying marsupial fossil teeth.
translation.fr:
J'ai été nommée assistante de recherche
sur les fossiles de marsupiaux.

translation.en: I don't fully understand what that means, but congratulations! [squeals]
translation.fr:
J'ai pas tout compris,
mais félicitations !

translation.en: I'm one of three assistants, so it's really not a big--
translation.fr: On est trois assistantes, c'est pas si…

translation.en: No, no! It is a big deal. You should celebrate.
translation.fr: C'est important. Tu devrais fêter ça.

translation.en: Because guess what? Tonight is… [singsong] …a celebration!
translation.fr:
Parce que tu sais quoi ?
Ce soir, on fait la fête !

translation.en: Okay. I'm gonna go change. Again.
So should you. Tonight'll be fun, I promise.
translation.fr: Toi aussi. On va s'amuser, promis.

translation.en: We leave in an hour-ish.
Love you, my bestie since we were six!
Whoo! Did I tell you how cute you look by the way? Uh, yeah, I think you did, like, 19 times. Got it.
translation.fr:
- Je t'ai dit que tu étais craquante ?
- Oui, environ 19 fois.

translation.en: Good. I meant it every single time. You look adorable.
translation.fr:
Je le pensais à chaque fois.
Tu es canon.

translation.en: -I love this dress on you. -Thank you. So, who's coming tonight?
translation.fr: Merci, Cassie. Qui sera là ce soir ?

translation.en: Okay. So Kayla's coming. Maddie's coming.
Moving in?
Oh, hi.
Of course you're moving in. I don't know why I just said that.
translation.fr:
Bien sûr que tu emménages.
C'était une question idiote.

translation.en: Hi, we're your neighbors.
I'm Cassie, and my quiet but highly intelligent roommate is--
translation.fr:
Moi c'est Cassie
et ma brillante colocataire…

translation.en: Lisa. Lisa.
Um, I'm around dinosaur bones all day,
so I'm not really used to talking to people that much.
translation.fr: j'ai pas l'habitude de parler aux gens.

translation.en: -Right. -Works in the Museum of Natural History.
translation.fr:
- Je vois.
- Au Musée d'histoire naturelle.

translation.en: Oh wow! Yeah, I compose music for video games all day,
translation.fr: Je compose la musique de jeux vidéo,

translation.en: so not a lot of human interaction for me either.
translation.fr:
donc moi aussi,
j'ai peu d'interaction humaine.

translation.en: Sorry, I'm Max, by the way.
Ordinarily, I'd shake your hand, but I'd almost certainly drop this,
translation.fr:
Je vous serrerais bien la main,
mais je ferais tomber ça

translation.en: um, and I desperately need these dishes.
translation.fr: et j'ai besoin de cette vaisselle.

translation.en: -Oh! Here. Let me open the door for you. -Brilliant. Cool.
translation.fr:
- Tiens. Je t'ouvre la porte.
- Super. Cool.

translation.en: Cool.
Okay, we've gotta go, but, um, welcome to the neighborhood, Max.
translation.fr: On doit y aller. Mais bienvenue, Max.

translation.en: -Yeah, thanks. See ya. -Yeah. Yeah.
-Oh, don't give me that look. -What look? I wasn't giving a look.
translation.fr:
- Ne me regarde pas comme ça.
- De quoi tu parles ?

translation.en: -You wanna play matchmaker? -I didn't say that.
Since you mentioned it, I did notice a spark.
-There was a spark? -Mm!
No, there was no spark.
I'm… I'm really focused on work right now, and I can't have any distractions.
translation.fr:
J'ai du travail,
je peux pas me laisser distraire.

translation.en: Not even in the form of our new neighbor and his cute accent?
translation.fr:
Pas même par ce voisin
et son petit accent ?

translation.en: I'm not like you.
I just mean you can juggle a social life. That's not me.
translation.fr: Toi, tu sais jongler avec une vie sociale.

translation.en: Yeah, well, I'm a party planner. It's built into the job.
translation.fr: Car je suis organisatrice de soirées.

translation.en: Well, I'm on a path here.
Nail this junior research position, get promoted to field researcher,
translation.fr:
j'assure à ce poste pour aller faire des fouilles
avec ma paléontologue préférée.

translation.en: and then work alongside my paleontologist hero.
translation.fr:
pour aller faire des fouilles
avec ma paléontologue préférée.

translation.en: Hey, I wanna introduce you to my friend Fun.
translation.fr: Je dois te présenter mon ami Fun.

translation.en: I don't know if you two have ever met.
[Lisa] Let me get through all of this stuff first, okay?
translation.fr: Je dois d'abord digérer tout ça.

translation.en: Downward Dad is out of control. He posts a different pose every day.
translation.fr:
Mon père est déchaîné. - Il publie une posture par jour.
- J'aime son corbeau.

translation.en: -[chuckles] I liked his flying crow. -Okay, do not encourage him.
translation.fr:
- Il publie une posture par jour.
- J'aime son corbeau. - Ne l'encourage pas.
- Je suis pas la seule.

translation.en: What? Wait. It's not just me. Do you see how many people like his yoga studio?
translation.fr:
- Ne l'encourage pas.
- Je suis pas la seule. Regarde tous les likes
pour son studio de yoga.

translation.en: Oh, I know. I've heard from everyone how amazing his classes are.
translation.fr:
Je sais. Tout le monde me vante
ses cours incroyables.

translation.en: We should take one.
No, I'm good. I got enough secondhand yoga from him growing up that I am centered for life.
translation.fr:
J'ai fait assez de yoga indirectement,
je suis conditionnée à vie.

translation.en: I think it's sweet that he's on social media. It's like he's trying to connect with you.
translation.fr:
C'est chou qu'il soit sur les réseaux.
Il essaie de se rapprocher de toi.

translation.en: Yeah, I love him, but he's my dad, not my buddy.
translation.fr:
Je l'aime, mais c'est mon père,
pas mon pote.

translation.en: I'm fine with our lives being separate.
Okay. Well, if you just left one comment, it would probably make his day.
translation.fr:
Si tu laissais un commentaire,
il serait aux anges.

translation.en: Fine. I'll throw him a like, but no comment.
translation.fr: Bon, d'accord ! Je like, mais aucun commentaire.

translation.en: -You happy? -Mm-hmm.
[Lisa] So this is, like, our 19th Cassie-palooza kickoff.
[Cassie] It's gonna be the best ever!
Hey, Bob.
Good evening, Cassie.
-Thank you. -Ladies, welcome.
She's my favorite person. I love her so much.
translation.fr: C'est ma personne préférée. Je l'adore.

translation.en: [man] Cassie's here!
-Wow. This is actually really pretty. -Hi!
-[woman] Happy birthday, Cassie! -[Cassie] Whoo!
[man 2] Happy birthday! It's so good to see you.
translation.fr: Bon anniversaire ! C'est bon de te voir.

translation.en: It's not my birthday, Jeremy. Not my birthday.
You are the best!
[man] Cassie! Drink, drink, drink!
-["Blush" by Koop playing] -[gasps] It's our song. -It's Koop! -Yeah.
-We have to dance! -[Lisa] Okay.
Come on! Come on!
Go, girl! Go, girl! Go, go! Break it down. Break it down.
translation.fr: Allez ! Montre-moi ce que tu sais faire.

translation.en: Go, Lisa! Go, Lisa!
I'm flying!
Careful! You're gonna get hurt.
-[crowd chanting] Drink! Drink! -Here! It's your birthday!
Should I do it? Should I do it? Okay.
-[crowd chanting] More! More! More! More! -Oh yeah!
-[Cassie] So much fun! You! -[woman] You kept drinking shots.
translation.fr: C'était trop cool ! T'as enchaîné les shots.

translation.en: Because you kept handing them to me!
translation.fr: C'est toi qui me les donnais !

translation.en: You're crazy! You're-- I can't keep up with you.
translation.fr: T'es folle ! Je peux pas te suivre.

translation.en: Okay, you guys, next stop is Roddy's house.
translation.fr: Le prochain arrêt, c'est chez Roddy.

translation.en: I rented a waterslide that goes from the roof into his pool!
translation.fr:
J'ai loué un toboggan
qui va du toit à sa piscine !

translation.en: What's wrong?
You're bailing, aren't you?
I bet you no one would notice if we snuck back home right now.
translation.fr:
Personne ne le verrait
si on rentrait maintenant.

translation.en: I would notice!
You know that these people are terrible, right?
translation.fr: Tu sais que ces gens sont horribles ?

translation.en: They're just trying to have a good time, which is exactly what you should be doing!
translation.fr:
Ils essaient juste de s'amuser,
ce que tu devrais faire !

translation.en: -Come on. -I like having a good time too.
Only I wanna do it with people who'd actually care if something happened to me,
translation.fr: Mais avec des amis qui se soucient de moi

translation.en: or who would like me even if I didn't rent a very dangerous waterslide.
translation.fr:
et m'apprécient même si je ne loue pas
un toboggan hyper dangereux.

translation.en: Don't tell me you're jealous.
I am not jealous of people who look filtered 24/7.
translation.fr:
Pas de gens
qui se cachent derrière un filtre.

translation.en: [under breath] I don't know! Kinda sounds like you're jealous to me!
-[woman] Come on, Cassie, let's go! -[laughing] Okay, one second!
translation.fr:
- Allez, Cassie, on y va !
- Une seconde !

translation.en: You know, you're different when you're with them. [Cassie] I'm what?
translation.fr:
- T'es différente quand t'es avec eux.
- Comment ça ?

translation.en: It's like you think you aren't worth anything if you aren't seen.
translation.fr:
Tu crois que tu vaux rien
si on te remarque pas.

translation.en: Well, at least I'm out making friends, and I'm not hiding at my desk.
translation.fr:
Moi, j'ai une vie sociale.
Je me cache pas derrière mon bureau.

translation.en: Because I think that there is more to life than partying
translation.fr: La vie ne se limite pas à faire la fête

translation.en: or knowing all the names of bartenders in town.
translation.fr: ou à connaître le nom des barmen.

translation.en: Here we go! My life isn't as important because it's social.
translation.fr: C'est ça, ma vie sociale ne vaut rien.

translation.en: Just because I'm not one of your science friends doesn't mean I don't work hard.
translation.fr:
Je suis pas scientifique
mais je travaille dur.

translation.en: -I didn't say that! -But you meant it!
I see how you only pretend to be interested when I tell you about some event I planned
translation.fr:
Tu fais semblant de t'intéresser
quand je parle de mes soirées

translation.en: or your offhanded comments about how I'm never home.
translation.fr:
ou tu insinues toujours
que je suis jamais là.

translation.en: Like you don't pretend to understand my life?
translation.fr: Et toi, tu fais pas semblant aussi ?

translation.en: Tell me what I do.
You work at the museum.
But what do I do there?
I don't know. I don't understand that stuff. And I don't understand your stuff.
translation.fr:
- Je sais pas. J'y comprends rien !
- Pareil pour moi.

translation.en: [scoffs, chuckles wryly] Classic.
We never hang out anymore.
Just the two of us.
We're busy. We'll just have to get better at making time for each other.
translation.fr:
On est débordées.
On doit juste trouver du temps pour nous.

translation.en: I don't know, Cassie. I don't think being friends should feel like work.
translation.fr:
Je sais pas. L'amitié,
ça devrait pas demander tant d'effort.

translation.en: I don't think it does, Lisa.
translation.fr: Je le ressens pas comme ça, Lisa.

translation.en: But I can tell from your face that you do.
translation.fr: Mais on dirait que toi, oui.

translation.en: It's fine.
I don't wanna stay best friends out of habit anyway.
translation.fr:
On va pas rester meilleures amies
par habitude.

translation.en: I'm a habit?
Th-- That's it? You're just gonna say something like that and walk away?
translation.fr: Tu dis un truc pareil et tu t'en vas ?

translation.en: Maybe it's time we both admit that we've outgrown each other.
translation.fr:
Il faut peut-être admettre
qu'on devrait passer à autre chose.

translation.en: -[Cassie] Who's ready to go to Roddy's? -[friends cheering]
translation.fr: Qui est prêt à aller chez Roddy ?

translation.en: [Cassie laughs] Let's do it. Sorry about that, guys.
Mona's missing her smile.
Here's one.
Put this here.
That'll fix it.
So stupid.
[sighs] So stupid.
Uh, hi.
Excuse me?
Did that go viral?
Oh, you're awake!
Welcome. Welcome.
No, no, don't worry. No, it's research. It's not gone viral.
translation.fr:
Non, ne t'inquiète pas.
C'est pour la recherche.

translation.en: I'm Val. I'll be your handler through this transition.
translation.fr:
Val, je serai ta gardienne
pendant cette transition.

translation.en: Well, it's nice to finally meet you, Miss Cassandra Adeline Garcia.
translation.fr:
Ravie de te rencontrer enfin,
Cassandra Adeline Garcia.

translation.en: Now, according to my notes, you go by Cassie. You're 25--
translation.fr:
D'après mes notes,
tu te fais appeler Cassie, tu as 25 ans…

translation.en: -In a few days. -Huh?
Parents, Howie and Sofia, divorced.
Born May 31st, died May 25th.
translation.fr: Née le 31 mai, décédée le 25 mai.

translation.en: Died?
Oh, I'm sorry. Died May 26th.
Who… who are you?
I'm Val. Otherwise known as your temporary guardian angel.
translation.fr: Je suis Val. Votre ange gardienne temporaire.

translation.en: You don't look like a guardian angel. Shouldn't you have a halo?
translation.fr: On dirait pas. Vous n'avez pas de halo ?

translation.en: -Oh, special occasions only. -Okay, what about wings?
translation.fr:
- Pour les grandes occasions.
- Et des ailes ?

translation.en: Oh, no, we phased those out years ago.
translation.fr:
Non, on les a supprimées
il y a des années.

translation.en: Okay. This… this can't really be happening.
I was… I was just with my friends.
Oh! I know! I… I had… I had champagne with gold flakes in it,
translation.fr:
Je sais ! J'ai bu du champagne
rempli de paillettes d'or.

translation.en: and sometimes it makes you hallucinate. [laughs] I'm hallucinating.
translation.fr:
Parfois, ça fait halluciner.
J'ai une hallucination.

translation.en: [laughs] No. This isn't a hallucination.
translation.fr: Non, ce n'est pas une hallucination.

translation.en: Oh, this… this part's always hard.
How can I put this?
Yeah, um, you died.
-Stop saying that! -I mean, you saw it yourself, so--
-I died in the bathroom? -Yeah.
Oh! Oh, this keeps getting worse!
[splutters] Look, it's going to be okay.
And the good news is that the worst is over now that you're d--
translation.fr:
Et le pire est passé,
maintenant que tu es m…

translation.en: No longer living.
You don't have to deal with all of those human annoyances,
translation.fr:
Tu n'as pas à endurer
tous ces tracas humains,

translation.en: you know, like heartbreak or PMS.
translation.fr:
comme le chagrin
ou le syndrome prémenstruel.

translation.en: Just think of the afterlife as one long spa day.
translation.fr:
Vois la vie après la mort
comme une longue journée au spa.

translation.en: And if you're one of the lucky ones, it could last for an eternity.
translation.fr:
Si tu es chanceuse,
ça pourrait durer à jamais.

translation.en: So, I went up?
-[inhales] Well-- -Is this down? I went down?
translation.fr:
- Eh bien…
- Je suis en enfer ?

translation.en: You're in the middle. We call this the In-Between.
translation.fr:
Tu es au milieu.
On l'appelle le Monde Intermédiaire.

translation.en: So like general admission?
Sure. This is your personal waiting room. It's your safe space.
translation.fr:
Oui. C'est ta salle d'attente personnelle.
C'est ton petit cocon.

translation.en: It's designed specifically to your taste
translation.fr: Il est conçu selon tes goûts

translation.en: to make your transition more… [inhales] …comfortable.
translation.fr: pour rendre ta transition plus agréable.

translation.en: So everyone who dies is in the In-Between?
translation.fr:
Tous ceux qui meurent
vont dans le Monde Intermédiaire ?

translation.en: Oh no. No, no, no. Maybe I should give you a pamphlet.
translation.fr:
Oh non. - Je devrais te donner un dépliant.
- Non, dites-moi !

translation.en: No, no! I don't need a pamphlet. Just tell me.
translation.fr:
- Je devrais te donner un dépliant.
- Non, dites-moi !

translation.en: It can't be crazier than anything that's happening.
Well, the In-Between is for those who have unfinished business
translation.fr:
Le Monde Intermédiaire est pour ceux qui ont encore
des choses à régler sur terre,

translation.en: back on Earth,
translation.fr:
qui ont encore
des choses à régler sur terre,

translation.en: like yourself.
What unfinished business?
Well, you get a second chance to make things right
translation.fr:
On te donne une chance
d'arranger les choses

translation.en: with a select list of people,
you know, and if you succeed, you get sent to the Above.
translation.fr: Si tu réussis, tu accèdes au paradis.

translation.en: And if you don't, well, you know, it's…
it's just, it's… Yeah, it's, you know… [whistles]
But I thought it was for murderers and people who don't like Beyoncé.
translation.fr:
C'est pas réservé aux meurtriers
et aux détracteurs de Beyoncé ?

translation.en: -I'm a proud member of the Beyhive. -[chuckles] Yeah.
No, no, it's a tiered system. Yeah.
translation.fr: Non, c'est un système à plusieurs niveaux.

translation.en: You want the Above. Trust me.
You ready to meet your list?
Now? No. I'm not ready! Oh!
That was like riding a roller coaster backwards and blindfolded.
translation.fr:
C'était comme un grand huit
les yeux bandés.

translation.en: [chuckles] You get used to it.
Wait, we're at my dad's house.
Hey, Dad!
[Cassie] Why isn't he responding?
He can't see or hear you.
translation.fr: Il ne peut ni te voir ni t'entendre.

translation.en: No one can.
What? No, that can't be right.
Well, we can't risk scaring people on Earth.
translation.fr:
On ne peut pas effrayer
les gens sur terre.

translation.en: They're so fragile.
[Cassie] Hello? Dad?
It's me! It's Cassie, your favorite and only child.
translation.fr: C'est moi, Cassie. Ta fille unique préférée.

translation.en: He never let me eat junk food.
What is goin' on?
And why is this house such a mess?
translation.fr: Et pourquoi la maison est dans cet état ?

translation.en: This… this is not like him.
translation.fr: Et pourquoi la maison est dans cet état ? Ça lui ressemble pas.

translation.en: He's Downward Dad. He's all about healthy living,
translation.fr: Il enseigne le yoga. Il a une vie saine.

translation.en: and he even makes his own kombucha.
How long have I been gone?
Val, how long?
-A year. -A year? It feels like a day.
translation.fr:
- Un an.
- Un an ? J'aurais cru un jour.

translation.en: Well, time works differently up there.
[sighs] Maybe I should've taken a pamphlet.
[Cassie] The last time he was like this was when my mom left.
translation.fr: Il était comme ça au départ de ma mère.

translation.en: After you passed,
he gave up.
When was the last time you saw him?
I… I don't know. I…
I kept meaning to visit, but there were all these events.
translation.fr:
Je voulais venir,
mais j'avais plein d'événements.

translation.en: I liked one of his posts. Does that count?
translation.fr: J'ai liké une publication. Ça compte ?

translation.en: Is that why he's on my list?
He's in mourning.
He needs a reason to feel hopeful again.
translation.fr:
Il lui faut une raison
pour reprendre espoir.

translation.en: Tell me what I should do.
You should see the rest of your list.
translation.fr: Découvre le reste de ta liste.

translation.en: Lisa? Really, Val? No. Pass. Hard pass.
translation.fr: Lisa ? Vraiment, Val ? Je mets mon veto catégorique.

translation.en: There is no hard pass. There isn't even a regular pass.
translation.fr:
Il n'y a pas de veto catégorique.
Pas même de simple veto.

translation.en: What about if I kill it with my dad? Not kill kill. You know what I mean.
translation.fr:
Et si je me débarrasse d'elle ?
Non, pas dans ce sens.

translation.en: Can we pretend Lisa isn't on the list?
translation.fr: On omet Lisa de la liste.

translation.en: Why are you so afraid of seeing your best friend again?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu redoutes de revoir ton amie ?

translation.en: -My former BFF, and I'm not. -Mm.
[Cassie] There's too much history between us.
translation.fr: Il s'est passé trop de choses.

translation.en: Besides, I don't know if I want to. Some friendships just end, you know?
translation.fr:
Et puis, j'ai pas envie.
L'amitié dure pas toujours.

translation.en: Shouldn't I have a say in who's on my list? This is my afterlife we're talking about.
translation.fr:
Je peux pas décider de ma liste ?
Il s'agit de ma vie.

translation.en: [inhales sharply] She's been hiding in her work ever since you left.
translation.fr:
Elle se mure dans le travail
depuis ta mort.

translation.en: Last one out. It's the same every day.
translation.fr:
Tous les jours,
elle est la dernière à partir.

translation.en: How about we skip Lisa and move to the next name?
translation.fr:
Et si on sautait Lisa
pour passer au nom suivant ?

translation.en: -I'll take it. No complaints. Pinky swear. -No. I don't do that.
translation.fr:
- Je l'accepterai sans me plaindre. Juré.
- Je ne fais pas ça.

translation.en: But I will show you who's next on your list.
translation.fr: Mais allons voir qui vient après.

translation.en: Please be Koop. Please be Koop. Please be Koop.
How are you doing that?
Oh, you can do it too. It's all part of your basic angel package.
translation.fr:
Tu peux, toi aussi.
Chaque ange est doté de ce pouvoir.

translation.en: You just focus on where you want to go, give a little snap or a nod.
translation.fr:
Concentre-toi sur le lieu,
claque des doigts ou hoche la tête.

translation.en: One angel I know likes to wink.
Just make it your own. And then you're there.
So, I can go anywhere?
translation.fr: Donc, je peux aller n'importe où ?

translation.en: Oh, no, not anywhere.
Your teleporting is limited to places that you're needed only.
translation.fr:
Ta téléportation est limitée
aux endroits requis.

translation.en: No detours.
-Got it. -Right. Now, back to the list.
translation.fr:
- Compris.
- Bien. Revenons à la liste.

translation.en: -Ugh. I don't know if I'm ready for more. -[woman] Morgan, slow down!
translation.fr: Je suis pas prête. Morgan, ralentis !

translation.en: -Wait for Mommy! -[Morgan giggles]
[in English] Hi, you're so fast. [kisses] Oh.
-That's-- -[Val] Your mother.
I haven't called her that since the day she moved out.
-She's Sofia to me. -[Sofia speaks indistinctly]
[Cassie] Is that my half sister?
I've never met her.
So, you do have some unfinished business, then.
translation.fr:
On dirait bien
que tu as des choses à régler.

translation.en: Can we go now, please?
translation.fr: On peut partir, s'il vous plaît ?

translation.en: [scoffs] It's only three names.
Not easy ones.
[tuts] Oh, you can do this, Cassie.
translation.fr:
Tu peux y arriver, Cassie.
Je crois en toi.

translation.en: -I believe in you. -That makes one of us.
translation.fr:
Tu peux y arriver, Cassie.
Je crois en toi. Pas moi.

translation.en: You have the five Earth days leading up to your birthday to complete this list.
translation.fr:
Tu disposes des cinq jours
précédant ton anniversaire pour tout régler.

translation.en: Wait, five days?
Sure. Why not? Hey, you know what? Why don't we make it two days?
translation.fr:
Mais bien sûr !
Et pourquoi pas deux jours ?

translation.en: Or better yet, we can just cram it all into one!
translation.fr: Ou un seul jour tant qu'on y est !

translation.en: Well, just think of it as Cassie-palooza, the afterlife edition.
translation.fr:
Vois ça comme la Palooza de Cassie,
édition posthume.

translation.en: It's… it's like Cassie…
No. No, you're right. Yeah.
Right, so a name will disappear
translation.fr:
Bon… Un nom disparaîtra
dès qu'on jugera le chapitre clos.

translation.en: each time it's deemed that you have closure.
translation.fr:
Un nom disparaîtra
dès qu'on jugera le chapitre clos.

translation.en: How am I supposed to do this if I can't communicate?
Well, you'll find a way.
Can I text? Tweet? TikTok?
translation.fr:
Je peux envoyer un texto ?
Un tweet ? TikTok ?

translation.en: No, no, and definitely negatory.
translation.fr: Non. Non. Et en aucun cas.

translation.en: Do I at least get cool superpowers, like mind control or something?
translation.fr:
Pas même un super-pouvoir
comme la télépathie ?

translation.en: It's guardian-angel level only.
This is about you learning to really connect with the people closest to you.
translation.fr:
Tu dois apprendre à communiquer
avec ceux qui te sont proches.

translation.en: Yeah, and what if I can't?
Well, I'll be here if you need me.
Except between noon and 4:00. [chuckles]
[chuckling] I'm kidding. It's a joke.
Look, I'm always going to be here for you.
translation.fr: Je serai toujours là pour toi.

translation.en: Now, is there anything else before go time?
Well,
actually, I, um…
I was wondering--
Yeah, yeah. I know what you're thinking.
translation.fr: Je sais à quoi tu penses.

translation.en: And, uh, yes,
you do get a wardrobe change.
Yeah, yeah. You just close your eyes and envision what you want to wear.
translation.fr:
Ferme les yeux
et imagine ce que tu veux porter.

translation.en: But just so you know, you only get one wardrobe change a day,
translation.fr:
Mais tu n'as droit
qu'à une tenue par jour.

translation.en: so make it count.
-It's so sparkly. -[rock music fades]
I think this might be my favorite part about being here.
translation.fr:
C'est mon moment préféré
depuis mon arrivée.

translation.en: I guess it really is time.
Somebody call Marie Kondo because joy is not sparking here.
translation.fr:
Il faudrait appeler Marie Kondo.
Ça respire pas la joie ici.

translation.en: Lisa first.
Great.
Guess I'm ripping the Band-Aid off.
What would Val do?
-I did it. -[whimsical music playing]
What the gamer geek?
Who are you, and what did you do to my room?
translation.fr: Qui es-tu et qu'as-tu fait de ma chambre ?

translation.en: Oh, the cute neighbor still lives here. Are you two in love yet?
translation.fr:
Le voisin vit toujours ici.
Vous êtes amoureux ?

translation.en: -Hey, you. -Hey. Morning.
-Are you just getting home now? -Yeah.
I'm, uh, in the process of scoring this game
about, uh, post-apocalyptic, motorcycle-riding zombie Vikings.
translation.fr:
sur des Vikings zombies à moto,
post-apocalypse.

translation.en: It sounds lame now I'm saying it out loud, but it's pretty dope
translation.fr: Ça a l'air nul dit comme ça, mais c'est pas mal

translation.en: if post-apocalyptic, motorcycle-riding zombie Vikings are your thing.
translation.fr: si c'est ton truc, les Vikings zombies à moto.

translation.en: You're heading to work early. Oh, no watch.
translation.fr: Tu travailles tôt. J'ai pas de montre.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I, um…
I like getting to work before everybody else, you know?
translation.fr: J'aime arriver avant tout le monde.

translation.en: The calm is… is, um--
Calming.
-Exactly. -Yeah.
-You get it. -Yeah, I do.
Cool, well, hopefully one day, when our schedules can align,
translation.fr:
J'espère qu'un jour,
quand nos horaires coïncideront,

translation.en: um, we can properly hang out? Me and you?
translation.fr: on pourra se voir, toi et moi.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah?
-Yeah, okay. Okay. Yes, yes. -Yeah.
-Yeah, I would… I would like that. -Brilliant.
-Okay, well, um, I'm gonna go. -Yeah.
-Cool. Well, have a good day. -Thank you. You too.
-Good seeing you. Bye. -Bye.
It's been a year, and you still haven't gone out with him?
translation.fr:
Après un an,
tu sors toujours pas avec lui ?

translation.en: It is a good thing I'm back.
So the way we ended things… Talk about bad timing!
translation.fr: Notre dernière conversation, c'était mal tombé.

translation.en: Are you still mad at me?
I know I should still be mad at you, but it doesn't feel right anymore.
translation.fr:
Je devrais encore t'en vouloir,
mais l'eau a coulé sous les ponts.

translation.en: -When did this place open? -[Lisa laughs]
Ugh! I hate being so out of touch!
translation.fr: Je déteste être à la ramasse !

translation.en: Morning, Emme. How are you?
Hi. I've got your order waiting.
Oh my-- Emme, you spoil me.
Who is Emme? I know all your friends, and I don't know her.
translation.fr: C'est qui ? Je connais tous tes amis.

translation.en: -[Lisa] Okay. -Ta-da!
Oh. Ooh. What is that smell?
translation.fr:
- C'est quoi, cette odeur ?
- Des nouveaux brownies.

translation.en: I'm working on a new brownie recipe. They're just out of the oven. Wanna try?
translation.fr:
- C'est quoi, cette odeur ?
- Des nouveaux brownies. Ils sont chauds. Tu veux goûter ?

translation.en: I will always be your guinea pig.
So, um, how has everything been? Are you feeling a little bit more settled?
translation.fr: Alors, comment ça va ? Tu prends tes marques ?

translation.en: [Emme] Things are good.
Haven't seen much of the town yet. I should probably get out more.
translation.fr:
Je n'ai pas beaucoup vu la ville.
Je devrais sortir plus.

translation.en: Baked goods aren't the best conversationalists.
translation.fr:
Mes pâtisseries
ne sont pas très causantes.

translation.en: Well, neither are bones.
I am thinking of throwing a one-year anniversary party for the shop.
translation.fr:
J'envisage de fêter
l'anniversaire de mon café.

translation.en: That would be so cool. Careful. It's hot.
translation.fr:
- Ce serait super.
- Attention, c'est chaud.

translation.en: -Oh! -[Lisa] Okay. I miss brownies. Why couldn't I have had death by chocolate?
translation.fr:
Ça me manque ! J'aurais pas pu mourir
d'un excès de chocolat ?

translation.en: Wow. Wow. I mean, this is… this is incredible.
Oh, it's made with love. And agave.
translation.fr: C'est fait avec amour. Et de l'agave.

translation.en: I need to go to work, but thank you. I'll see you later, okay?
translation.fr:
Je dois aller bosser.
Mais merci. À plus tard.

translation.en: -Ciao for now. -Bye!
So, how's your list coming along?
translation.fr: Alors ? T'en es où dans ta liste ?

translation.en: The quiet type, huh?
So…
this is your life now.
-You beat me to work. Again. -[gasps, exhales]
Oh, jumpy.
Are you on something?
Next time, bring enough for the whole class! [laughs]
Yeah.
-What do you want, Raj? -[Raj] Did you hear?
translation.fr:
Tu veux quoi, Raj ? - On t'a dit ?
- Quoi ?

translation.en: Uh, hear what?
Dr. Redding's leading a dig at Hell's Creek this summer,
translation.fr: Dr Redding va fouiller Hell Creek cet été.

translation.en: and she's looking for a junior field researcher to join.
translation.fr:
Elle cherche
un jeune chercheur de terrain.

translation.en: Wait, Dr. Marion Redding? Are you messing with me?
translation.fr: Dr Marion Redding ? Tu te fous de moi ?

translation.en: Not only that, the GOAT herself is coming into the office
translation.fr:
Et elle vient en personne
pour faire passer les entretiens.

translation.en: to hold interviews. I'm about to go sign up over at the…
translation.fr:
Et elle vient en personne
pour faire passer les entretiens. Je vais m'inscrire dans la…

translation.en: break room.
[Cassie] A sign-up sheet.
translation.fr:
Une fiche d'inscription.
Comme c'est rétro !

translation.en: How retro. But I dig it.
translation.fr:
Une fiche d'inscription.
Comme c'est rétro ! Mais je kiffe.

translation.en: What are you waiting for? Just write your name.
translation.fr: Tu attends quoi ? Écris ton nom.

translation.en: L-I--
-[Raj] Pretty competitive, huh? -[groans]
translation.fr: Il y a de la concurrence.

translation.en: And she's only picking one person.
translation.fr: Et elle ne choisira qu'une personne.

translation.en: I think we all know who that'll be.
translation.fr: On sait tous qui ce sera.

translation.en: R-A-J.
B-R-I-T-T-O.
[winces] Only four spots left.
Don't listen. He's trying to psych you out in the lamest way possible.
translation.fr:
Il essaie juste de t'intimider,
de la pire des façons.

translation.en: I'm gonna sign up later.
I have a lot of work to do,
so I can't really think about this kind of thing right now.
translation.fr: J'ai beaucoup de travail, je ne peux pas penser à ça.

translation.en: Sure.
You're giving up?
In the bag, Britto.
What's so important?
I left a farmer in his barn-themed waiting room for you. Are you okay?
translation.fr:
J'ai dû laisser un fermier
dans sa salle d'attente. - Ça va ?
- C'est Lisa.

translation.en: It… it's Lisa. She's so stubborn.
translation.fr:
- Ça va ?
- C'est Lisa. Elle est si têtue.
Je ne pense pas que ça va marcher.

translation.en: You know, I don't think this is gonna work.
translation.fr:
Elle est si têtue.
Je ne pense pas que ça va marcher.

translation.en: She doesn't seem to miss me. There's no trace of me anywhere.
translation.fr:
Je ne lui manque pas.
Il n'y a aucune trace de moi.

translation.en: Oh, and get this. I've been replaced by this roommate who is full-on dark web.
translation.fr:
Et sa nouvelle colocataire
est à fond sur le dark web.

translation.en: -Why aren't you saying anything? -You're saying enough for the both of us.
translation.fr: Vous dites rien ? Tu parles assez pour deux.

translation.en: Look, I know going back is hard,
translation.fr: Je sais que c'est dur de revenir là-bas.

translation.en: but you aren't forgotten. Oh, I don't know about that.
translation.fr:
- Mais on ne t'a pas oubliée.
- Pas sûr.

translation.en: Well, maybe if we cut out all the "I"s and "me"s and look harder,
translation.fr:
Peut-être qu'en arrêtant
de te regarder le nombril et en observant mieux,

translation.en: you'll find that she actually does need you.
translation.fr: tu verrais qu'elle a besoin de toi.

translation.en: Why are you sleeping?
There is a whole world out there, and you are missing it.
translation.fr:
Le monde t'attend dehors
et tu passes à côté.

translation.en: Lisa. Lisa, wake up.
I need to talk to you.
translation.fr: Il faut que je te parle.

translation.en: Lisa, wake up!
Wake up! Wake up! Wake up!
Wake up! Wake up!
Come on, Val. This isn't fair.
How am I supposed to do this if my best friend can't see or hear me?
translation.fr: Elle ne peut ni me voir ni m'entendre !

translation.en: I need a little help here, please!
[Lisa] Piper, turn down your game.
translation.fr: Piper, baisse le son de ton jeu.

translation.en: Trying to sleep.
-Why won't you let me sleep? -[humming continues]
-What's happening? -[splutters] I don't know.
translation.fr:
- Que se passe-t-il ?
- Je sais pas.

translation.en: Oh, but it worked!
You can't be… you can't be here. No.
Oh, you can see me?
This is a dream. Maybe a nightmare.
translation.fr: C'est un rêve. Peut-être un cauchemar.

translation.en: Work… work… work has been stressful.
translation.fr: C'est le travail qui me stresse.

translation.en: You can hear me too?
[gasps] This isn't supposed to be happening.
This is awesome, and crazy, but mostly awesome.
translation.fr: C'est génial. Et dingue, mais surtout génial.

translation.en: You aren't here. Nope. You died.
translation.fr: Tu n'es pas là. Tu es morte.

translation.en: Yeah, that sucked.
I don't believe in whatever you are.
translation.fr: Quoi que tu sois, tu n'existes pas.

translation.en: I'm nothing scary! I'm like a junior guardian angel.
translation.fr: N'aie pas peur ! Je suis une ange gardienne. Ou presque.

translation.en: Well, not officially. I don't know if that's a thing,
translation.fr: Je suis une ange gardienne. Ou presque. Enfin, c'est mon explication.

translation.en: but that's how I make sense of it. Titles aren't important right now.
translation.fr: Enfin, c'est mon explication. Mais on s'en fiche des titres.

translation.en: I'll be back.
Not… not in an ominous way! In a good way.
It's really nice to be able to talk to you again.
translation.fr: C'est sympa de pouvoir te parler.

translation.en: [whispering] Please be gone. Please be…
translation.fr: Faites-la disparaître, je vous en prie.

translation.en: Sorry for interrupting, but you'll never believe what happened. Lisa--
translation.fr: Désolée, mais vous n'allez pas en revenir.

translation.en: Can see and hear you. Yep. Yep. Everyone knows. You're trending.
translation.fr:
- Lisa…
- Peut te voir et t'entendre. Tout le monde en parle.

translation.en: I've heard rumors of this, but I've never experienced it.
Making contact used to be fairly common,
but now, with all the distractions, it's practically non-existent.
translation.fr:
mais avec les distractions de nos jours,
ça n'arrive presque plus.

translation.en: Well, it happened.
You never forget the first time your friend looks at you in sheer terror.
translation.fr: Je n'oublierai jamais son air terrorisé.

translation.en: Everyone's staring at me like I'm a unicorn.
translation.fr: Ils me prennent pour une licorne ?

translation.en: This is the Angels' Den. It's the central command of the In-Between.
translation.fr:
C'est le repaire des anges,
le QG du Monde Intermédiaire.

translation.en: Unicorns are in a different area.
translation.fr: Les licornes sont dans une autre aile.

translation.en: A book? Really?
Yes. Don't you just love books?
translation.fr: Oui. Les livres sont fantastiques, non ?

translation.en: Okay.
Mm. Here.
translation.fr: TU ME VOIS. QUOI FAIRE ? Voilà.

translation.en: Yep, yep, yep. There we are.
Okay. It's quite rare.
"Said In-Betweener can only affect the physical world once visible to subject."
translation.fr:
"Vous n'affectez le monde physique
qu'une fois visible par le sujet.

translation.en: "It mainly happens in cases
where the people involved were extraordinarily connected."
translation.fr:
"lorsque les personnes
avaient une forte connexion.

translation.en: "Some call it soul mates or kindred spirits."
translation.fr:
"Certains parlent d'âmes sœurs
ou de compagnons d'âme."

translation.en: So,
it might be a fluke in the system,
or it's just you and Lisa.
translation.fr: soit c'est juste toi et Lisa.

translation.en: -We should test it. -Okay.
Go on, then. Start talking to someone. Let's see what happens.
translation.fr: Allez ! Va parler à quelqu'un. On verra bien.

translation.en: Okay. Hey! What's up?
translation.fr: Va parler à quelqu'un. On verra bien. Hé ! Ça roule ?

translation.en: Go on.
Hey, guys. How's it goin'?
translation.fr: Salut, les gars. Comment ça va ?

translation.en: Hello?
Hey, ladies! Ooh! I like your shoes. [chuckles]
translation.fr:
Salut, les filles !
J'adore tes chaussures.

translation.en: -[women speaking indistinctly] -No? Nothing?
Okay. No one's responding.
I'm usually the center of the party, not on the sidelines. This feels odd.
translation.fr: D'habitude, je suis le centre d'attention. C'est bizarre.

translation.en: You seem strangely cheerful for someone trying to solve a fluke in the system.
translation.fr:
Vous semblez bien gaie
malgré ce dysfonctionnement.

translation.en: There's just so much energy.
Isn't it beautiful?
You know the saying "angel on your shoulder"?
That's who I want to be.
A guardian angel who's there through all of these stages of life.
translation.fr:
Une ange présente
dans toutes les étapes de la vie.

translation.en: Not just at the end.
So why don't you? It's not my decision to make.
translation.fr:
- Alors, faites-le.
- Ce n'est pas moi qui décide.

translation.en: Is this dog barking at me?
[Val] Oh, he can see you!
Yeah. Animals are more open to the spiritual world. Some kids are too.
translation.fr:
Ils sont plus ouverts au monde spirituel.
Certains enfants aussi.

translation.en: No, poppet, we're working. Go back to your owner.
translation.fr: Non, on travaille. Retourne à ton maître.

translation.en: [Val] Go on.
So we can talk to animals?
Not we. I can. Yeah, it's above your power grade.
translation.fr:
Seulement moi.
Tu n'as pas ce pouvoir à ton rang.

translation.en: -Oh. -Sorry.
Right, so nothing from strangers.
translation.fr: Donc, pas de réaction chez les inconnus.

translation.en: -Nope. -That's good, actually. Less cleanup.
We should try someone close to you.
Not much to report since I talked to you last.
translation.fr: Rien de neuf depuis la dernière fois.

translation.en: Is he trying to talk to me?
I stopped seeing that woman I told you about, Maria.
translation.fr:
J'ai arrêté de voir la femme
dont je t'ai parlé. Maria.

translation.en: She's nice. I'm just not ready yet.
translation.fr: Elle est sympa, mais je ne suis pas prêt.

translation.en: He's been doing this since you left. Brings him comfort.
translation.fr:
Il fait ça depuis ton décès.
Ça le réconforte.

translation.en: This whole room does.
The yoga studio's doing fine.
translation.fr: Le studio de yoga marche bien.

translation.en: I'm still more focused on running it than teaching.
translation.fr: Je passe toujours plus de temps à le gérer qu'à enseigner.

translation.en: There's been requests for me to teach my sunrise class again. I probably should.
translation.fr:
On réclame mon cours au lever du soleil.
Je devrais le faire.

translation.en: I just feel so guilty going on like normal when you can't.
translation.fr:
Je me sens coupable de continuer
comme si de rien n'était.

translation.en: I miss you, kiddo.
All I ever wanted was to protect you, and I couldn't even do that.
translation.fr:
Je voulais te protéger.
Je n'ai même pas su.

translation.en: Oh, Dad, but you did.
translation.fr: Mais si, papa, tu l'as fait.

translation.en: Remember that song I used to sing to you when you were little?
translation.fr:
Tu te souviens de la chanson
que je te chantais, petite ?

translation.en: I don't remember.
Try. Maybe I will.
That was a long time ago.
I'm sorry for not visiting much.
translation.fr: Pardon de ne pas être venue.

translation.en: For making fun of your Downward Dad posts.
translation.fr: De m'être moquée de tes publications.

translation.en: I'm gonna let you know I'm okay.
translation.fr: Je vais te faire savoir que ça va.

translation.en: Somehow.
We can try your mum.
I'm not ready for her yet.
I'm going back to Lisa. I wanna fix this.
translation.fr: Je retourne voir Lisa. Je veux réparer ça.

translation.en: It'll be day two, so make it count.
translation.fr: Attention, ce sera le deuxième jour.

translation.en: [whispering] I'm clearly just having a stroke.
Wait, Lisa, wait!
-You felt that too? -[whispering] This isn't happening.
translation.fr:
- Tu as senti ça ?
- Ce n'est pas réel.

translation.en: Let me explain, okay? Or at least try.
translation.fr:
Laisse-moi t'expliquer.
Ou du moins essayer.

translation.en: Uh, there's this list. And for me to get to the big party in the sky--
translation.fr:
J'ai une liste.
Pour aller à la grande fête au ciel…

translation.en: [whispering] Go away.
A door? Really?
[loudly] Oh, come on!
Let's analyze some fossils. Whoo!
I'm not gonna hurt you. I just wanna talk.
translation.fr:
Je ne te veux pas de mal.
Je veux juste parler.

translation.en: Okay. If you don't wanna talk right now, then we don't have to. Fine.
translation.fr:
Tu ne veux pas parler maintenant,
comme tu voudras.

translation.en: But I'm not going anywhere until we do.
translation.fr: Mais en attendant, je ne bougerai pas.

translation.en: [Lisa] No, no. I'm just working too hard.
translation.fr: Je travaille trop dur, c'est tout.

translation.en: Because I'm working hard, it could cause the visions.
Okay. I'm sick! So sick. I'm sick.
translation.fr: Je suis malade. Je suis timbrée.

translation.en: -Otherwise, it doesn't make sense. -Maybe not, but it's happening.
translation.fr:
- C'est la seule explication.
- En tout cas, c'est réel.

translation.en: Don't be shy. Come and try.
Why wait till it's too late?
Uh-oh. You look like you could do with a caramel mocha pretzel bite.
translation.fr: Tu as besoin d'un bretzel caramel-moka.

translation.en: Or two.
Let's get you inside.
This place has so much potential, but what is with all the doilies?
translation.fr:
Ce café a du potentiel,
mais pourquoi ces napperons ?

translation.en: Would you like a calming tea or…
[whispering] No. I… I don't need calming.
translation.fr: Non, je n'ai pas besoin de me calmer.

translation.en: I need an exorcist.
[scoffs] Well, I can't help you with that.
[Lisa] Okay. So, um, this is the one-year anniversary of my best friend's death.
translation.fr:
Voilà… Ça fait un an
que ma meilleure amie est morte.

translation.en: -I think it's making me a little crazy. -Your flatmate, the one you told me about?
translation.fr:
- Ça me rend dingue.
- Ta coloc dont tu m'as parlé ?

translation.en: -You told her about me? -Yeah, Cassie.
translation.fr: Tu lui as parlé de moi ?

translation.en: This is gonna sound really weird, but, um,
translation.fr: Ça va te paraître bizarre, mais…

translation.en: she talks to me, and… [breathes heavily]
…I can see her.
That doesn't sound weird at all. She was your best mate. She's part of you.
translation.fr:
C'est normal.
C'était ton amie. Elle fait partie de toi.

translation.en: -Thank you for letting me lay this on you. -[Emme laughs]
I just… I really, really needed to talk to someone.
translation.fr:
J'avais vraiment besoin
de parler à quelqu'un.

translation.en: Is she here now?
-Yeah. Yeah. She, uh… -[Emme] Oh. …she thinks your store needs a makeover.
translation.fr:
Oui. Elle pense que ton café
a besoin d'un relooking.

translation.en: Oh! Well, I'm open to anything that will encourage people to hang out.
translation.fr: Si ça peut attirer la clientèle.

translation.en: See? She agrees with me. I'm starting to like this Emme.
translation.fr:
Elle est d'accord !
Je commence à bien l'aimer.

translation.en: [Emme] Look, everyone deals with grief in their own way.
translation.fr: Tout le monde fait son deuil à sa manière.

translation.en: -It's a compliment when they come back. -This doesn't feel like a compliment.
translation.fr:
- Vois le côté positif.
- Je vois pas le côté positif.

translation.en: -Would your friend like an eclair? -Don't… don't encourage her, please.
translation.fr:
- Elle veut un éclair ?
- Ne l'encourage pas.

translation.en: Thank you for understanding, Emme. Thank you. I just…
I think that I need to go and be by myself for a while. I'm just gonna do that.
translation.fr: Je dois me retrouver seule un moment. Je vais y aller.

translation.en: Who turns down a free eclair? I can't eat, and I'd still take it.
translation.fr: Qui refuse un éclair ? Moi, si je pouvais…

translation.en: [whispering] Could you please just give me a little bit of space?
translation.fr: Tu pourrais pas me lâcher un peu ?

translation.en: Okay, that's it. I'm Googling therapists.
translation.fr:
- Tu t'es vidé la tête ?
- Ça suffit, je vais chercher un psy.

translation.en: I didn't mean to scare you. Okay? [splutters] I am also trying to make sense of everything.
translation.fr:
Je voulais pas t'effrayer.
Moi aussi, j'essaie de comprendre.

translation.en: Look, is this happening because of that fight we had?
translation.fr: C'est à cause de notre dispute ?

translation.en: If I had known that was the last time we would see each other, I--
translation.fr:
Si j'avais su
que c'était la dernière fois…

translation.en: I would have done things differently too.
Is that why you're here? Be… because of what I said?
translation.fr:
Tu es là pour ça ?
À cause de ce que j'ai dit ?

translation.en: According to…
-Do you mean God? -Val.
A woman? I knew it. Val's my handler. She's like my temp guardian angel.
translation.fr:
- Une femme ? J'en étais sûre.
- Val est mon ange gardienne.

translation.en: In order for me to move up, fingers crossed,
translation.fr: Pour aller au ciel, croisons les doigts,

translation.en: I'm supposed to help you, my dad, and my mom for some reason.
translation.fr:
je dois t'aider toi,
mon père et ma mère, bizarrement.

translation.en: Well, I don't need help.
Look, I didn't make the list.
I wanna show you something.
I found it under your bed.
Your dad took the rest of your stuff.
translation.fr: Ton père a pris le reste.

translation.en: Um… [smacks lips] You wouldn't recognize your room. -Oh, I saw. -Huh.
translation.fr:
- Tu reconnaîtrais pas ta chambre.
- J'ai vu.

translation.en: Something told me I should keep it.
translation.fr: Je sentais que je devais le garder.

translation.en: -I thought you'd forgotten about me. -What?
translation.fr:
- J'ai cru que tu m'avais oubliée.
- Quoi ?

translation.en: We've been in each other's lives for as long as I can remember.
translation.fr:
On a tout vécu ensemble
depuis toutes petites.

translation.en: How… how could you think that?
Being dead brings up a lot of insecurities.
translation.fr: Quand on meurt, on perd confiance en soi.

translation.en: [Lisa] Are those from your mom?
[Cassie] Yep.
Postcards from all the amazing places she visited after she left us.
translation.fr:
De tous les endroits incroyables
qu'elle a visités après être partie.

translation.en: would you… [chuckles]
…maybe wanna puzzle?
You still have it.
[Lisa] Some of the pieces might be missing.
I found it on the floor that morning.
translation.fr: Je l'ai trouvé par terre ce matin-là.

translation.en: Can't leave Mona without her smile this time.
translation.fr: On doit finir le sourire de Mona.

translation.en: Look, I don't know what's happening, and I probably need to schedule an MRI,
translation.fr:
Je sais pas ce qui se passe
et je devrais sûrement passer une IRM,

translation.en: but it is really, really nice to have you back.
translation.fr: mais je suis contente que tu sois là.

translation.en: It's really nice to be back.
Hi, Piper.
Are you okay?
No.
-What do you think she does in there? -Money laundering, hacking.
translation.fr:
- Elle fait quoi ?
- Blanchiment d'argent, piratage.

translation.en: Basic roommate stuff.
-This almost feels like old times. -Almost.
translation.fr:
- C'est presque comme au bon vieux temps.
- Oui.

translation.en: -You know what'd make it better? -Your boyfriend Koop's music?
translation.fr:
- Il manque un truc.
- Ton Koop chéri ?

translation.en: I can't help who I love!
You forget that I introduced you to his greatness.
translation.fr:
- Je te l'ai fait découvrir.
- C'est mon âme sœur.

translation.en: He's my soul mate. Do you know he has a new song?
translation.fr:
- Je te l'ai fait découvrir.
- C'est mon âme sœur. - Il a sorti un titre.
- Un album.

translation.en: -More like a whole album. -Are you serious? I've missed so much.
translation.fr:
- Il a sorti un titre.
- Un album. J'ai raté tellement de choses !

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. Hey, Google, play "Drive" by Koop.
-Impromptu dance party! -Impromptu dance party!
I knew you'd love it!
I'm gonna bring it low again. I'm gonna bring it low again.
She's goin'. She's goin'. She's goin', goin', goin'.
-I like this! -[Lisa laughing]
You got good moves.
-There you are. -I don't need food anymore.
translation.fr:
- Tiens.
- J'ai plus besoin de manger.

translation.en: -Sorry. -That's okay.
I can't imagine a world without cold noodles.
I think I had more dinners at your house than at my own.
translation.fr:
J'ai plus souvent dîné
chez toi que chez moi.

translation.en: Especially during my dad's cooking learning curve. Remember that?
translation.fr:
Surtout quand mon père cuisinait.
Tu te souviens ?

translation.en: -You know my parents love you. -I love them.
Look, I know that you thought your dad was overprotective.
translation.fr:
Tu penses
que ton père était trop protecteur.

translation.en: Smothering.
But he did the best he could, Cassie.
translation.fr: Mais il a fait de son mieux.

translation.en: Yeah.
-Yeah, I'm starting to realize that. -["Drive" ends]
translation.fr: Je commence à m'en rendre compte.

translation.en: -[video game music playing] -[Cassie] Is that next door?
Doesn't that get annoying?
I don't find it annoying.
No, no, no! He's just super talented and cute and smart.
translation.fr:
Non ! Il est super talentueux,
mignon et intelligent.

translation.en: Oh, you still have a crush!
What'll you do about this year-long crush?
Absolutely nothing.
We're fine the way we are. I…
-I don't wanna mess things up. -What's to mess up?
translation.fr:
- Je veux pas tout gâcher.
- Gâcher quoi ?

translation.en: If you don't go after what you want, how will you get it? Like that job interview.
translation.fr:
Tu dois suivre tes envies.
C'est comme ce poste.

translation.en: You know you want it, but you didn't even sign up.
translation.fr: Tu le veux, mais tu t'es pas inscrite.

translation.en: -How do you know about that? -I am everywhere. Duh.
translation.fr:
- Comment tu sais ça ?
- Je suis partout.

translation.en: For someone who studies bones, you need to get some in your back.
translation.fr:
Pour quelqu'un qui aime creuser,
creuse-toi un peu la tête.

translation.en: -How long have you waited to say that? -When did you declare your major again?
translation.fr:
- Depuis quand tu voulais dire ça ?
- Quand t'as choisi ta spécialité ?

translation.en: Since you were digging dirt in your backyard, you knew what you wanted, and I have always admired that.
translation.fr:
Tu as toujours su ce que tu voulais
et j'ai toujours admiré ça.

translation.en: Really? 'Cause you used to tease me pretty hard about being so work-focused.
translation.fr:
Vraiment ? Tu me rabâchais tout le temps
que je travaillais trop.

translation.en: Okay. Well, that was alive me, and she was so very wrong.
translation.fr:
C'était la Cassie vivante
et elle avait vraiment tort.

translation.en: That's it.
This is why I'm here.
I'm going to get you together with Dreamy Max!
translation.fr: Je vais te caser avec ton Max chéri !

translation.en: I am sure that there are more substantial reasons why you're here.
translation.fr: Il doit y avoir de meilleures raisons.

translation.en: No! Shush. Okay, this is my warm-up.
Okay, if we can hear his music, then he can hear ours.
translation.fr:
Si on entend sa musique,
il entend la nôtre.

translation.en: And since you aren't going to go to him, it's time for him to come to you.
translation.fr:
Comme tu ne vas pas à lui,
il va venir à toi.

translation.en: Hey, Google, replay Koop.
[louder] Replay Koop.
Um, I'm not sure she speaks angel.
translation.fr: Elle parle pas le langage des anges.

translation.en: A little help, please?
Hey, Google, replay Koop.
Tell her to go louder. We want it to sound like you're having the best time ever.
translation.fr:
Plus fort
pour qu'il croie que tu t'éclates.

translation.en: Curiosity will hit, and he won't be able to stay away. It's science.
translation.fr:
Ça va l'intriguer et il va venir.
C'est scientifique.

translation.en: Hey, Google, highest volume, please.
translation.fr: Google, mets le volume à fond.

translation.en: Yes.
-Okay. What do we do now? -Wait for it.
Three,
two…
What happened to one?
Huh. He's shyer than I thought.
translation.fr: Je le pensais pas si timide.

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Going old school. Knocking on his door.
translation.fr:
- Tu vas où ?
- Frapper à sa porte.

translation.en: -What? No! -Yeah. I'm doing it!
Cassie! So embarrassing!
Hi. Hey. Um, I heard you playing music, and I was gonna knock,
translation.fr:
Salut. J'ai entendu ta musique
et j'allais frapper.

translation.en: but then I didn't wanna disturb, so I didn't yet.
translation.fr: Je voulais pas déranger, donc j'hésitais.

translation.en: -Are you having a party in here? -Who, me? No.
translation.fr: Tu fais une fête ? Moi ? Non.

translation.en: I'm just rockin' out.
Hey, is it too loud? 'Cause I can turn it down.
translation.fr: C'est trop fort ? Je peux baisser.

translation.en: Hey, hey, Google, turn it off.
No, you didn't have to do that on my account. It's a great song though.
translation.fr:
Tu n'avais pas à faire ça.
C'est une super chanson.

translation.en: -Oh, I can turn it back on. -No, not if you don't want to.
translation.fr:
- Je peux la remettre.
- Seulement si tu veux.

translation.en: Sorry. Look, you know how we were saying that we wanted to hang out?
translation.fr: Désolé. On avait parlé de faire un truc ensemble.

translation.en: Well, uh, Koop's actually shooting a music video tomorrow.
translation.fr:
- Koop tourne un clip demain.
- Quoi ?

translation.en: -What? -My friend's directing it.
translation.fr:
- Koop tourne un clip demain.
- Quoi ? Mon ami le réalise.
Il m'a proposé de venir voir.

translation.en: He wanted to know if I wanted to visit the set.
translation.fr:
Mon ami le réalise.
Il m'a proposé de venir voir.

translation.en: -So, uh, I thought maybe… -He's chickening out. Invite him in.
translation.fr:
Alors je me suis dit… - Fais-le entrer.
- Arrête.

translation.en: -Stop it. -Stop what?
I didn't say anything. Did you say something?
translation.fr:
- Arrête quoi ?
- J'ai rien dit. Toi ?

translation.en: [coughs] Ask him in.
Do you wanna come in? I think I have some wine.
translation.fr:
Tu veux entrer ?
Je crois que j'ai du vin.

translation.en: Sure. Yeah. No, I'd… I'd love that.
Okay, okay. Cool shoes.
Mmm. You smell clean. A good start.
Yeah, this is pretty much exactly like walking into my place.
Except a lot bigger and a lot less stuff.
translation.fr: Mais en bien plus grand et mieux rangé.

translation.en: A little obvious, Max. My friend is a genius. You can do better.
translation.fr:
Oui, mon amie est une génie.
Tu peux faire mieux.

translation.en: Shut up. You're a puzzler?
I'm a puzzler.
Yeah. I can lose myself for days doing one of those.
translation.fr:
Je peux y passer des jours
sans en décoller.

translation.en: -I just started up again. -No way.
translation.fr:
- Je m'y suis remise.
- Ah oui ?

translation.en: My best friend Cassie and I, we used to puzzle all the time.
translation.fr: J'en faisais tout le temps avec Cassie.

translation.en: Oh, here. I found it in the back of the fridge,
translation.fr: Tiens. C'était au fond du frigo,

translation.en: so I'm not sure if it's good.
translation.fr: je sais pas s'il est bon.

translation.en: Vintage. Nice.
Only the best for you, neighbor.
-Cheers. -Cheers.
Have you ever been arrested? How is your credit?
translation.fr:
Max, tu t'es déjà fait arrêter ?
T'es riche ?

translation.en: -[spits] -Oh, are you okay?
translation.fr:
Max, tu t'es déjà fait arrêter ?
T'es riche ? Ça va ?

translation.en: I'm fine.
It's disgusting. [laughs]
Bottoms up.
[coughs] Well, now we're in it together, right?
translation.fr: On est dans le même bateau.

translation.en: Aw, he's adorable.
So it must've, um, been hard, you losing your friend like that.
translation.fr:
Ça a dû être dur
de perdre ton amie comme ça.

translation.en: -How long's it been? A year? -This week, yeah.
translation.fr:
- Ça fait un an ?
- Cette semaine, oui.

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -Thanks.
Though sometimes I just feel like she's actually hovering right over me.
translation.fr:
Mais parfois, j'ai l'impression
qu'elle plane au-dessus de moi.

translation.en: I'm in the way. Hint taken. I'll be in your room if you need me.
translation.fr:
Reçu 5 sur 5.
Je vais dans ta chambre.

translation.en: How are those dinosaurs of yours? They still extinct?
translation.fr:
Et tes dinosaures ?
Toujours pas ressuscités ?

translation.en: Yeah. That happened.
Um, yeah, I… I mostly work with fossils.
translation.fr: Je travaille surtout sur des fossiles.

translation.en: I just find something so comforting in… in holding history in your hands.
translation.fr:
C'est réconfortant
de tenir l'histoire entre ses mains.

translation.en: The tangible is easier to believe in, right?
translation.fr:
Oui, ce qui est tangible
est plus facile à croire.

translation.en: Exactly. Yeah, I've always thought that.
-On a scale of one to ten… -Mm-hmm.
translation.fr: Sur une échelle de un à dix,

translation.en: …how big of a Jurassic Park fan are you?
translation.fr: tu mets combien à Jurassic Park ?

translation.en: -No, like a 20. -[Cassie] Twenty!
She watched it all the time!
All the time.
I… I, um, I watched it a lot.
And Indiana Jones.
I blame my geekiness on those movies actually.
I like your geekiness.
Late. It's getting late.
I have to work tomorrow.
Yeah, no. Yeah, of course.
Um, well, look,
thanks for having me. [chuckles]
And for the questionable wine. -[Lisa laughs] -That was great.
translation.fr: Et pour le vin douteux. C'était génial.

translation.en: And I'll see you soon. Yeah?
Yeah, yeah, yeah.
-Cool. -Cool.
-Bye. -Bye.
That was a good-ish start. Now you have to learn how to stick the landing.
translation.fr:
Bon début. Maintenant,
tu dois apprendre à conclure.

translation.en: I think I really like him.
Well, then it's good you kicked him out.
Okay. I need to go to bed.
And don't watch me sleep tonight. It's creepy.
translation.fr:
Et ne me regarde pas dormir.
C'est flippant.

translation.en: Aye, aye, Captain.
Proud of you!
[Lisa] God, I'm so stupid.
What was I even thinking?
Why did I kick him out?
I totally blew it.
So stupid.
"Thanks for the wine"? Who says that? Like she's my waiter for the evening.
translation.fr:
"Merci pour le vin" ? Qui dit ça ?
Comme si c'était une serveuse.

translation.en: For God's sake, why can't I just ask her out like a normal human being?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi je l'ai pas invitée
comme une personne normale ?

translation.en: I had the chance, and I blew it.
Oh, what was I thinking?
-It was like I was leaving a wake. -They really are made for each other.
translation.fr: Et j'étais si formel ! Ils sont faits l'un pour l'autre.

translation.en: Oh. "I like your geekiness"? I mean, who says that?
translation.fr: "J'aime ton côté geek" ? Qui dit ça ?

translation.en: "Hi. I'm Max, your weird neighbor, and you'll never speak to me again."
translation.fr:
"Je suis Max, ton voisin bizarre,
tu vas m'éviter."

translation.en: Cool. Nice one, dude. Brilliant. Brilliant. What a corker.
Oh, so cute. [kisses]
I'm late!
What? Seriously? I don't have time for this, Cassie!
translation.fr: Quoi ? Sérieusement ? J'ai pas le temps, Cassie !

translation.en: [scoffs] Right.
[Lisa] Piper, don't forget the rent check!
-["Blush" playing loudly] -Codswallop!
-Hey. -Hey, sorry. I… I didn't see you there.
I'm a bit of a mess right now. I'm late for work, and I--
translation.fr:
Je ressemble à rien.
Je suis en retard et…

translation.en: It's okay. I'm on my way, um, to get some coffee.
translation.fr: C'est rien. J'allais prendre un café.

translation.en: -Cool. -This is a coincidence.
translation.fr:
Cool. - Quelle coïncidence.
- On peut dire ça comme ça.

translation.en: Yeah, that's… that's one word for it.
translation.fr:
- Quelle coïncidence.
- On peut dire ça comme ça.

translation.en: Listen, I really should have asked this last night,
translation.fr: J'aurais dû te le demander hier soir,

translation.en: but would you wanna go to that Koop music video thing with me?
translation.fr:
mais ça te dit d'aller voir
le clip de Koop avec moi ?

translation.en: I thought it'd be cool to see what goes on behind--
translation.fr: Ça doit être sympa de voir les coulisses.

translation.en: Yeah. Yes.
Cool. Well, I can pick you up at 4:00, if that works?
translation.fr:
Super. Je peux venir te chercher à 16 h.
Ça te va ?

translation.en: I'm not exactly a leave-work-early kinda gal, but, yeah, why not?
translation.fr: Je suis pas du genre à partir tôt, mais… Pourquoi pas ? 16 h, c'est bien.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, 4:00 is great.
-Don't be late. -[both laugh]
What about your coffee?
Right. Yeah, no. Sorry.
I… I forgot I'm actually in the throes of a pretty vicious eBay bidding war
translation.fr:
J'avais oublié que j'étais
en pleine guerre d'enchères sur eBay

translation.en: over the original VHS of David Bowie's the Labyrinth,
translation.fr:
pour la VHS du Labyrinthe
avec David Bowie.

translation.en: and I really should get back to that.
No rest for the wicked and all that. But I will see you later. Yeah?
translation.fr:
Pas de repos pour les braves.
On se voit plus tard.

translation.en: -Okay. Yeah, I'll see you later too. -Bye.
translation.fr:
- Oui, à plus tard.
- Au revoir.

translation.en: Bye.
Thanks, fairy godmother.
-[Sofia] Am I doing it wrong? -[Morgan] Yes.
-[Sofia] Do I got it now? -[Morgan] Yes.
Oh. All right. Time to start Project Get Dad Out of his Funk.
translation.fr:
Bien. Je lance le projet
"Sortir papa de sa déprime".

translation.en: What to do first?
Come on, Dad. You know you're tempted to try this out.
translation.fr: Allez, papa. Tu sais que tu as envie d'essayer.

translation.en: That's it? Not even a downward dog?
translation.fr: Pas même un chien tête en bas ?

translation.en: Your yoga-avoiding daughter is trying to connect here.
translation.fr: Ta fille anti-yoga essaie de communiquer.

translation.en: I can take a hint, universe.
Or Cassie.
-Ooh, that looks good. -Oh, she always…
translation.fr:
- Ça a l'air bon.
- Bon sang !

translation.en: -Wear a bell or something. -[scoffs]
Are you trying to shut me out?
I don't want people to think that I'm talking to myself.
translation.fr:
Je veux pas qu'on croie
que je parle toute seule.

translation.en: Oh. Look around. Everybody looks like they're talking to themselves.
translation.fr:
Regarde autour de toi,
ils parlent tous tout seuls.

translation.en: It's talking to each other we have trouble with.
translation.fr: C'est parler aux autres, le souci.

translation.en: -Oh, that's surprisingly deep. -I have my moments.
It's been one of those days.
translation.fr: Il y a des jours comme ça.

translation.en: Well, luckily, your best friend is here, even if she is wearing EarPods.
translation.fr:
Mais ta meilleure amie est là,
même si elle porte des EarPods.

translation.en: I'm trying to help my dad.
You should see his house. It's a mess. And he stopped doing yoga.
translation.fr:
C'est un foutoir chez lui.
Et il a arrêté le yoga.

translation.en: -Wait, seriously? -Yeah.
-That is so unlike him. -[sighs]
Although you know what? He hasn't posted in a while.
translation.fr:
Cela dit,
il n'a rien posté depuis longtemps.

translation.en: Yeah. We can't communicate like you and I, so I'm trying to get creative.
translation.fr:
Je peux pas communiquer comme avec toi,
donc j'essaie d'être créative.

translation.en: I, uh, I also saw Sofia.
She was with her daughter. My half sister, Morgan.
translation.fr:
Elle était avec sa fille.
Ma demi-sœur, Morgan.

translation.en: They were playing at the park. She came to your service.
translation.fr:
- Elles jouaient.
- Elle est venue à tes funérailles.

translation.en: I wanna be happy for her. I do.
translation.fr: Je veux me réjouir pour elle,

translation.en: But seeing her so carefree, you know, it hurts,
translation.fr: mais la voir si insouciante, ça fait mal.

translation.en: and I get angry, and it's just…
translation.fr: Je me mets en colère et…

translation.en: It's not a very angelic reaction, huh?
I mean, I wouldn't know, but, uh,
it does sound like a pretty human one.
I don't know how I'll make things right before my time is up.
translation.fr: Je sais pas comment régler ça à temps.

translation.en: A little buzz here. Let's see what it is.
Wait! Downward Dad is back!
-Whatever you're doing, it's working! -[gasps, laughs]
translation.fr: Quoi que tu fasses, ça marche !

translation.en: So…
So?
-Are you ready for your big date? -Date? What date?
translation.fr:
- Prête pour ton grand rencard ?
- Quel rencard ?

translation.en: Are you kidding me? I'm freaking out! Why do you think I'm stress eating?
translation.fr:
Je flippe !
À ton avis, pourquoi je me goinfre ?

translation.en: Oh, you're so lucky I came back. I know.
translation.fr:
- Heureusement que je suis là.
- Je sais.

translation.en: It's okay, right?
This is what you wear when you're sick, and you go to CVS for more cough medicine.
translation.fr:
Tu portes ça quand t'es malade
et que tu vas à la pharmacie.

translation.en: Okay. Hey, now, we don't all have your never-ending supply of brand-new clothes.
translation.fr:
On n'a pas tous
une nouvelle garde-robe illimitée.

translation.en: Love this one.
[gasps] Yes. With red lipstick.
translation.fr: Oui. Avec du rouge à lèvres.

translation.en: -Okay, don't push it. -Pink lip?
-Fine. -[squeals]
Uh, wait!
-The pink lip. -The pink lip.
Let's see.
Yeah. Yeah, I like it. I li-- I don't know. Is it… is it me?
translation.fr:
Ça me plaît.
Je sais pas. Ça me ressemble ?

translation.en: -You look perfect. -Really?
That cutie composer won't know what hit him. Come here.
translation.fr:
Ton compositeur chéri restera bouche bée.
Viens ici.

translation.en: -[knocking at door] -He's here! He's here!
-Ah! Wait, wait, wait! -Okay, come on. Let's go!
-Wait! One last thing. Hold on. -[spraying]
-Turn. -Stop spraying me! Stop it! He's here.
translation.fr: Tourne ! Arrête de m'arroser ! Il est là.

translation.en: You look…
You look wow yourself.
-After you. -Thank you. You're welcome.
Thanks.
Mmm. And he has manners.
What are you doing here?
Like I'd miss a chance to see Koop live and in person.
translation.fr:
J'allais pas rater Koop.
Je me ferai toute petite.

translation.en: -Don't worry. You won't know I'm here. -Cassie!
translation.fr:
J'allais pas rater Koop.
Je me ferai toute petite. Cassie !

translation.en: -[Max] You all right? -Great.
♪ Come on ♪
♪ I think I finally found My favorite thing ♪
translation.fr: Je me suis découvert une passion

translation.en: ♪ And it's closer than it seems ♪
translation.fr: Elle est plus proche qu'il n'y paraît

translation.en: ♪ Open my eyes Girl, can you take me there? ♪
♪ Have I seen you in a dream? ♪
♪ And it feels like, ooh ♪
♪ Every time I look at your face Your face ♪
translation.fr: Chaque fois que je te regarde

translation.en: ♪ It feels like, ooh ♪
♪ I'm running, but I'm stuck in one place One place ♪
translation.fr:
Je cours
Mais je reste coincé au même endroit

translation.en: ♪ It only takes one look And I'm into you ♪

translation.en: ♪ There could be A hundred people in the room ♪
translation.fr:
Je pourrais te voir
Dans une foule immense

translation.en: ♪ If you take a chance You could feel it too ♪
translation.fr:
Jette-toi à l'eau
Tu verras ce que je ressens

translation.fr: Un seul regard Un seul regard

translation.en: ♪ I'm floating higher… ♪
Thanks.
-For what? -Taking us here.
-We really appreciate it. -We?
Did I say we? I meant me. I really appreciate it.
translation.fr: J'ai dit "on" ? Je parlais de moi. J'apprécie vraiment.

translation.en: Well, I'm really glad you're here.
translation.fr: Je suis content que tu sois là.

translation.en: ♪ Every time I look at your face Your face ♪
translation.fr: Chaque fois que je te regarde

translation.en: ♪ It feels like, ooh ♪
♪ I'm running But I'm stuck in one place ♪
translation.fr:
Je cours
Mais je reste coincé au même endroit

translation.en: ♪ It only takes one look And I'm into you… ♪

translation.en: Holy crap.
♪ …a hundred people in the room ♪
♪ If you take a chance You could feel it too ♪
