Jette-toi à l'eau
Tu verras ce que je ressens

translation.en: ♪ All it takes is one look, one look ♪
Way to angel block, Val.
I know you like him, but he's not on your list.
translation.fr: Il ne figure pas sur ta liste.

translation.en: Can we add him, please? He was right there. I couldn't resist.
translation.fr:
On peut l'ajouter ? Pitié !
Il était là. J'ai pas pu résister.

translation.en: Please stop glaring. Your disappointed look is weirding me out.
translation.fr:
Me fixez pas avec cet air déçu,
c'est flippant.

translation.en: Need I remind you that you're still on the clock, young lady?
translation.fr: Dois-je te rappeler que l'heure tourne ?

translation.en: You have just two days left, and no one has been marked off your list.
translation.fr:
Il te reste deux jours
et personne n'a été rayé de ta liste.

translation.en: I'm working on it, okay? This is harder than I thought.
translation.fr: J'y travaille. C'est plus dur que prévu.

translation.en: You're on track.
translation.fr: Tu es sur la bonne voie.

translation.en: Just stay focused.
Open your heart.
Possibly only a slight upgrade from the back of the fridge.
translation.fr:
Peut-être un peu meilleur
que le fond de frigo.

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Pairs best with regret?
[laughs] Yeah.
Uh, to regret.
To regret.
-Cheers. -Cheers.
-Seriously? -Sorry, are we not…
-I'm-- Sorry. -Are you okay?
My knee cramped up.
I can't believe the terrible timing for a pain like that. It's--
translation.fr:
J'ai une crampe au genou. Ça ne pouvait pas arriver
à un pire moment.

translation.en: I thought this was… Are we not a thing, or am I just confused?
translation.fr:
Il y a un truc entre nous
ou j'ai mal compris ?

translation.en: Max, no, I'm so sorry.
I'm just… I'm a little nervous and edgy, and I've got a lot going on.
translation.fr:
Je suis nerveuse
et il se passe plein de choses.

translation.en: Full confession.
I have liked you since the first time we met.
translation.fr: Tu m'as plu dès notre rencontre.

translation.en: Yeah?
-Yeah. -Oh.
Full confession. I've liked you since then too.
translation.fr:
Je dois t'avouer.
Tu m'as plu dès notre rencontre.

translation.en: And I may regret saying this out loud, but…
translation.fr:
Et je vais peut-être regretter
d'avoir dit ça, mais…

translation.en: I still have this overwhelming desire to kiss you.
translation.fr: J'ai toujours très envie de t'embrasser.

translation.en: [softly] I like confessions.
You have that good-date glow.
translation.fr: On dirait que ça s'est bien passé.

translation.en: -He wants to go back out again. -[exclaims]
-Sorry for crashing. -[sighs]
I was, uh, non-living vicariously through you.
translation.fr: Je vivais par procuration à travers toi.

translation.en: It's okay. Just… just do me a favor
translation.fr:
C'est rien. Mais s'il te plaît,
ne viens pas à nos autres rendez-vous.

translation.en: and maybe don't come on any of our other dates.
translation.fr:
Mais s'il te plaît,
ne viens pas à nos autres rendez-vous.

translation.en: No chaperone.
[clicks tongue] Got it.
-I'm glad it went well. -Oh, it really did.
We spent the entire night just talking.
translation.fr: Et on a passé la nuit à discuter.

translation.en: He's so interesting.
He knows all of these obscure bands.
translation.fr: Il connaît tous ces groupes inconnus.

translation.en: Plus, um, he even got me this blanket before I said I was cold.
translation.fr:
Et il m'a apporté une couverture
avant que je lui demande.

translation.en: Oh, and he smells really, really good.
-Like pine and pizza. -[laughs]
translation.fr: Un mélange de pin et de pizza.

translation.en: -You're falling for him. -Yeah, I am.
Why are you crying?
These aren't sad tears.
translation.fr:
- C'est pas des vraies larmes.
- Mais si !

translation.en: -Yeah, but they're still tears. -This is your time. It's not about me.
translation.fr:
- C'est pas des vraies larmes.
- Mais si ! On parle de toi, pas de moi.

translation.en: It's just…
I guess it's starting to hit me that I'm never gonna have a first kiss again,
translation.fr:
Je me rends compte
que je n'aurai plus de premier baiser.

translation.en: or go on an amazing date, or go on a bad date.
translation.fr: Ni de super rencard ou de mauvais rencard.

translation.en: But worst of all,
I'm not gonna be here to watch all your career successes.
translation.fr:
je ne serai pas là
pour ta réussite professionnelle.

translation.en: I won't be here to watch you walk down the aisle and become a mother.
translation.fr:
Je ne serai pas là quand tu te marieras
et auras des enfants.

translation.en: And, oh, you're gonna be an amazing mom, Lis. Thanks.
translation.fr:
- Tu seras une super maman.
- Merci.

translation.en: [voice cracking] Your kids are always gonna know they're loved.
translation.fr:
Tes enfants sauront toujours
qu'ils sont aimés.

translation.en: Plus, they're gonna… [sighs deeply]
…dominate the science fair.
-Oh, they will, won't they? -[chuckles] Yeah.
Sorry, maybe these are sad tears. [laughs]
This isn't fair.
No one should have to die young.
I have to believe there's a reason for it.
translation.fr: Je dois croire qu'il y a une raison.

translation.en: Even if I don't know what it is yet.
-This is all my fault. -No!
translation.fr:
- Tout est de ma faute.
- Non !

translation.en: If I'd just stayed there with you that night, then none of this would've even happened.
translation.fr:
Si j'étais restée avec toi,
rien de tout ça ne serait arrivé.

translation.en: No. This was gonna happen no matter what you did. It was my time.
translation.fr:
Ça n'aurait rien changé.
C'était mon heure.

translation.en: When… when you were a kid, and your parents would fight,
translation.fr: Petite, quand tes parents se disputaient,

translation.en: I was the one who would distract you with a puzzle.
translation.fr: je te distrayais avec un puzzle.

translation.en: Yeah, and you had extra PJs for me whenever I didn't wanna go home.
translation.fr:
Et tu avais un pyjama pour moi
quand je ne voulais pas rentrer.

translation.en: -You've always been there for me. -But that night, I wasn't.
translation.fr:
- Tu as toujours été là.
- Pas ce soir-là.

translation.en: I mean, I heard you coming to my door, and I…
translation.fr: Je t'ai entendue à ma porte et je…

translation.en: I have been mad at myself ever since.
Don't be.
In a weird way, what happened is a good thing.
Now… now you get to live your own life and don't have to worry about taking care of me anymore.
translation.fr:
Tu peux vivre ta propre vie.
Tu n'as plus à t'occuper de moi.

translation.en: You don't mean that.
I can't lie. I'm almost an angel.
translation.fr:
Je peux pas mentir.
Je suis presque un ange.

translation.en: I'd like to be there for you one last time.
translation.fr: Je veux t'aider une dernière fois.

translation.en: I don't know why I'm supposed to care about her.
translation.fr: Pourquoi je dois me soucier d'elle ?

translation.en: She left me, you know?
But she's on my list, so… [exhales]
translation.fr: Mais elle est sur ma liste.

translation.en: Well, hey, if you don't care, then why keep her postcards?
translation.fr:
Si tu t'en fiches,
pourquoi garder ses cartes ?

translation.en: How can I help you with your mom?
I can't believe she lives here.
This is exactly what she ran away from.
translation.fr: C'est exactement ce qu'elle a fui.

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi. I was so glad you called.
Come in.
Thanks.
I, um, thought we could catch up on the patio.
I made lemonade. Would you like some? I have tea.
translation.fr: J'ai fait de la limonade. Sinon, j'ai du thé,

translation.en: I have one of those Jarritos. You used to love those.
translation.fr: ou ce soda mexicain que tu adorais.

translation.en: Um, I think water is fine. Thanks.
-[Sofia] How are you, Lisa? -Good.
-[Sofia] Still working at the museum? -Yeah.
[Lisa] Yeah, it's been busy, but it's been really good.
translation.fr:
- Je travaille beaucoup mais ça va.
- Bien.

translation.en: -[Sofia] Good. -How are you?
translation.fr:
- Je travaille beaucoup mais ça va.
- Bien. Et vous ?

translation.en: [Sofia] Busy. Busy with Morgan.
translation.fr: J'ai beaucoup à faire avec Morgan.

translation.en: -This is Morgan. -Oh, let me see.
-Oh, she's so cute! -She's like Cassie in a lot of ways.
translation.fr:
- Trop mignonne !
- Elle ressemble à Cassie.

translation.en: Yeah, look, she's got that same mischievous grin.
translation.fr: Elle a le même sourire malicieux.

translation.en: They would've liked each other. I always wanted to introduce them,
but I wanted Cassie and I to be okay first.
translation.fr:
mais je voulais d'abord
me rabibocher avec Cassie.

translation.en: I'd like to get started.
So,
I found these in Cassie's box of keepsakes.
translation.fr:
J'ai trouvé ça
dans la boîte à souvenirs de Cassie.

translation.en: She kept them?
It was my only way to know you. Tell her that, please.
translation.fr:
C'était ma seule façon de te connaître.
Dis-lui.

translation.en: Yeah. I think they made her feel closer to you.
translation.fr: Ça la rapprochait un peu de vous.

translation.en: I used to read her Mary Poppins. [laughs]
She always wanted to see London. Did she ever go?
translation.fr: Elle rêvait de Londres. Elle y a été ?

translation.en: No, I didn't go anywhere. I was hoping you would come back to me.
translation.fr:
Non, j'espérais
que tu reviennes me chercher.

translation.en: No, she didn't.
Too bad. She would have loved it.
Mmm. Her first crush, actually, was this guy who moved here from England.
-Ian. -[Lisa] Ian.
It's one of the many things we have… had in common.
translation.fr:
C'est… c'était l'un
de nos nombreux points communs.

translation.en: I missed so much of her life.
It must have been confusing for her, dealing with boys and dating.
translation.fr:
Elle a dû avoir du mal
à gérer sa vie amoureuse.

translation.en: Yeah, but my mom was there for both of us to answer some of the tough questions, so…
translation.fr:
Oui, mais ma mère était là
pour répondre aux questions difficiles.

translation.en: Ask her why she left.
I'm sure that this is, like, really hard to talk about, but, um…
translation.fr:
Je me doute que c'est dur
de parler de ça, mais…

translation.en: Cassie always wanted to know why you left.
There's not one reason.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas une seule raison.

translation.en: What did I do to make you leave?
Was it something Cassie did?
No, never.
Cassie, she was an angel.
It was all me.
I was young.
And I thought I knew more than anyone around me. Sounds like Cassie.
translation.fr:
- Je croyais savoir mieux que les autres.
- Comme Cassie.

translation.en: I, uh, had this romantic idea of what I thought being a wife and mother was like.
translation.fr:
J'avais une conception romantique
de la vie de femme et de mère.

translation.en: But in reality,
I wasn't ready to be responsible for anyone.
translation.fr: je n'étais pas prête à assumer.

translation.en: Looking back at it, I see how patient and loving Howie was,
translation.fr:
Avec le recul, je vois à quel point
Howie était patient et aimant.

translation.en: but at the time,
I found that suffocating.
I said the same thing.
For a while, Howie used to send me
pictures and letters,
telling me about her.
I never knew that.
But I was too ashamed to respond, so he stopped.
translation.fr:
Par honte, je ne répondais pas
alors il a arrêté.

translation.en: I convinced myself that postcards were an adequate placeholder,
translation.fr:
Je me suis persuadée
que les cartes postales étaient un bon substitut

translation.en: and one day I'd be able to explain it all, and we'd actually laugh about it.
translation.fr: et qu'un jour, je pourrais tout expliquer et qu'on en rirait.

translation.en: Sounds so ridiculous when I say it out loud.
translation.fr: Ça semble ridicule quand je m'entends.

translation.en: I… I let her down.
The last time I saw her was college graduation, and we were like strangers.
translation.fr:
Je l'avais vue à sa remise de diplôme.
On était comme des inconnues.

translation.en: I remember.
Now it's too late to make it right.
And I'll never forgive myself for that.
translation.fr: Je ne me le pardonnerai jamais.

translation.en: Okay, I've heard enough. [clears throat] I need to go.
translation.fr: J'en ai assez entendu. Je dois y aller.

translation.en: If Cassie was here right now,
what would you say to her?
What are you doing? I didn't ask that.
That I regret not taking her to London.
translation.fr: Que j'aurais dû l'emmener à Londres.

translation.en: I should have been there
to help her with her homework,
hold her when she had a nightmare.
I made a lot of selfish decisions.
translation.fr: J'ai pris beaucoup de décisions égoïstes.

translation.en: But one thing that never changed--
translation.fr: Mais une chose n'a jamais changé.

translation.en: One thing that never changed was my love for her. [clears throat]
translation.fr:
Une chose n'a jamais changé,
mon amour pour elle.

translation.en: If Cassie were here…
I would tell her that the day she was born
translation.fr:
je lui dirais
que le jour de sa naissance

translation.en: was one of the brightest moments of my life.
translation.fr:
était l'un des plus beaux
moments de ma vie.

translation.en: And running away,
it was my worst.
I just hope she knows how sorry I am.
translation.fr:
J'espère qu'elle sait
à quel point je suis désolée.

translation.en: She does.
She knows.
Are you okay?
How are we supposed to we finish this if we don't have all the pieces?
translation.fr: Comment finir s'il manque des pièces ?

translation.en: God, this is so frustrating. Why did you even choose this puzzle?
translation.fr:
C'est frustrant !
Pourquoi tu as choisi ce puzzle ?

translation.en: Uh, you sure you wanna talk about the puzzle?
translation.fr: Tu es sûre de vouloir parler du puzzle ?

translation.en: Do you know how hard it was not being able to say everything I wanted to her?
translation.fr:
Tu sais à quel point c'était dur
de rien pouvoir dire ?

translation.en: I really don't.
I have years of questions.
Yet standing next to her, I found that I just wanted to yell or run away.
translation.fr:
Mais là, à côté d'elle,
j'avais juste envie de crier ou de fuir.

translation.en: Like mother, like daughter. Yeah, but you didn't, and that's a really good thing.
translation.fr:
- Telle mère, telle fille.
- Mais tu ne l'as pas fait et c'est bien.

translation.en: Would you have translated if I did?
translation.fr: Tu lui aurais dit si j'étais partie ?

translation.en: It upset me that you took the conversation over.
No, no. I didn't take anything over.
I could tell that she needed to talk to you,
translation.fr:
J'ai senti
qu'elle avait besoin de te parler

translation.en: and you needed to hear what she had to say.
That was for me to decide!
-I'm on your side, Cassie. -Ugh.
translation.fr: Je suis de ton côté, Cassie.

translation.en: I could tell she needed to talk. You needed to hear what she had to say!
translation.fr:
Elle avait besoin de parler.
Tu avais besoin de l'écouter !

translation.en: You don't get it!
How could you? You have a perfect life, a perfect future. I have none of those.
translation.fr:
Tu as une vie et un avenir parfaits.
Moi, j'ai rien de tout ça.

translation.en: Okay, okay. You're mad at your mom. That's totally understandable, but…
translation.fr:
Tu es en colère contre ta mère.
C'est compréhensible, mais…

translation.en: You know what? It's… [sighs]
It's not okay for you to take it out on me.
translation.fr: Ne me rejette pas la faute.

translation.en: Sorry. Does my messy non-life make you uncomfortable?
translation.fr: Ma non-vie te met mal à l'aise ?

translation.en: Here we go again. Classic.
I died before I ever got a chance to live!
translation.fr: Je suis morte avant d'avoir pu vivre !

translation.en: Well, I'm hurt too! Did you think about that, huh?
translation.fr: Moi aussi, je souffre ! Tu y as pensé ?

translation.en: God, after our fight,
after you left, I had to carry around the guilt of our fight.
translation.fr:
après ta mort,
j'étais rongée par la culpabilité.

translation.en: I had to pick up the pieces, put my life back together without you.
translation.fr:
J'ai dû me relever,
réorganiser ma vie sans toi.

translation.en: Well, you did a great job. Look around! There's nothing left of me!
translation.fr:
Beau boulot.
Y a pas une trace de mon passage.

translation.en: I've been reduced to a box of knickknacks!
translation.fr: J'ai été réduite à une boîte de bibelots.

translation.en: After everything that's happened, I can't believe we're back to arguing.
translation.fr:
Après tout ça,
je peux pas croire qu'on se dispute.

translation.en: Well, I'm dead,
so you don't have to worry about arguing with me ever again.
translation.fr: tu te disputeras plus jamais avec moi.

translation.en: You cannot bring that anger in here.
Look, I… I met with my mom. I got Lisa a boyfriend.
translation.fr:
J'ai vu ma mère.
J'ai trouvé un copain à Lisa.

translation.en: I've been talking to my dad even though he can't hear me.
translation.fr: J'ai parlé à mon père qui ne m'entend pas.

translation.en: Isn't that enough? Do I have to go back?
translation.fr: Ça suffit pas ? Je dois y retourner ?

translation.en: Well, not if you don't want to.
Thank you.
Well, then, why don't I just walk you over to the elevator?
translation.fr:
Dans ce cas,
je vais t'accompagner à l'ascenseur.

translation.en: When you get there, hit "B" for Below.
translation.fr: Devant, presse le bouton pour descendre.

translation.en: -Very funny. I get it. -No, you don't.
Why would you risk throwing away everything you've worked toward?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi risquer de gâcher
tout ce que tu as fait ?

translation.en: And over an argument?
You were doing so well.
-You think I'm doing well? -Yes, I do. Don't you?
I don't know. Maybe.
I hoped I wouldn't have to tell you this, but here we are.
translation.fr:
J'espérais ne pas avoir à te dire ça,
mais tant pis.

translation.en: If you really want this to end now, I can make that happen.
translation.fr:
Si tu veux vraiment arrêter,
c'est possible.

translation.en: But just know, if you leave the list unfinished,
translation.fr:
Mais sache
que si tu laisses ta liste inachevée,

translation.en: then all the good you've been doing will be undone.
translation.fr: tout le bien que tu as fait sera annulé.

translation.en: Everything?
Lisa?
My dad?
Everything.
Oh, that's… that's terrible.
I can't… I can't do that to them.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas leur faire ça.

translation.en: -[exhales sharply] -So, you've made your decision?
translation.fr: Alors, tu as pris ta décision ?

translation.en: Dad, I really need to talk--
-What is she doing here? -More tea?
Please.
I still can't believe you left your accounting practice to open a yoga studio.
translation.fr:
J'arrive pas à croire
que tu aies ouvert un studio de yoga.

translation.en: You always joked about it, but I never thought you'd actually do it.
translation.fr:
Tu en parlais,
mais je ne pensais pas que tu le ferais.

translation.en: [Howard] I also joked about becoming a drummer in an '80s cover band.
translation.fr:
Je disais aussi
que je deviendrais batteur.

translation.en: -[chuckles] I remember that one. -This was a better lifestyle choice.
translation.fr: Je m'en souviens. J'ai fait le bon choix.

translation.en: [chuckles] It suits you.
You might not have said that a few days ago.
translation.fr:
Tu n'aurais pas dit ça
il y a quelques jours.

translation.en: This past year has been a challenge.
[Sofia] You know, Lisa visited me today.
translation.fr: Lisa est venue me voir aujourd'hui.

translation.en: I know this may sound nutty.
During that visit, it…
it was almost as though Cassie were standing right beside me.
translation.fr:
j'ai eu la sensation
que Cassie se tenait à mes côtés.

translation.en: I know what you mean.
She was a lot like you though.
Fearless, independent.
She'd dive headfirst into… [chuckles] …any situation.
translation.fr:
Elle fonçait tête baissée
dans toutes les situations.

translation.en: But more than anything, she was this force of energy who lit up every room she entered.
translation.fr:
Mais surtout, c'était une boule d'énergie
qui irradiait partout où elle allait.

translation.en: After Lisa left, I, um…
I had this overwhelming urge to see you.
translation.fr: j'ai ressenti le besoin de te voir.

translation.en: I just need you to know how deeply sorry I am for walking out.
translation.fr:
Je veux que tu saches à quel point je suis désolée
d'être partie.

translation.en: It wasn't how I saw life going, that's for sure.
translation.fr:
Ce n'était pas la vie
que j'avais imaginée.

translation.en: Your leaving forced me to become a better man, a better parent,
translation.fr: Ton départ m'a forcé à devenir meilleur, un meilleur parent.

translation.en: even when she didn't want me to,
and I hope that in some way I was able to minimize whatever scars she had.
translation.fr:
J'espère que d'une certaine façon,
j'ai pu panser ses blessures.

translation.en: Yeah, I know you did.
[clears throat] Look, I've kept you long enough.
Thanks for this. [chuckles]
You know, I don't know if it's the palo santo in the air or this dandelion tea talking,

Je ne sais pas si je dis ça
